thread.title: BRIEF-Novoheart Signs Agreement With Sumocor To Develop Therapeutics For Heart Failure

title: BRIEF-Novoheart Signs Agreement With Sumocor To Develop Therapeutics For Heart Failure
text: February 14, 2018 / 2:22 PM / in 4 minutes BRIEF-Novoheart Signs Agreement With Sumocor To Develop Therapeutics For Heart Failure Reuters Staff Feb 14 (Reuters) - Novoheart Holdings Inc: * NOVOHEART SIGNS AGREEMENT WITH SUMOCOR TO DEVELOP NOVEL THERAPEUTICS FOR HEART FAILURE * NOVOHEART HOLDINGS INC - CO, THROUGH ITS U.S. UNIT, HAS ENTERED INTO A COMMERCIAL AGREEMENT WITH SUMOCOR LLC * NOVOHEART - AS PER AGREEMENT, CO WILL TEST SUMOCOR‘S CANDIDATE THERAPEUTICS IN 3 PHASES ON CO‘S MYHEART PLATFORM OF HUMAN BIOENGINEERED HEART CONSTRUCTS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
